text.name: Royal Armor of Nix
text.description:
{Royal Armor of Nix}

Worn on the torso, this item increases your Power skill by +6.
text.event: You see a fight on a hill nearby. As you get closer, you see two nix. One is winning, and as he is about to land a finishing blow, you intervene. The defeated nix thanks you for your help, and gifts you with his armor. He believes you deserve it more than he does.
